mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple and blue - green on white) announcing Bluebird at the Boro, to benefit Hillsboro High School, featuring Pam Tillis, Dan Seals, Mark Collie, Gary Nicholson, Don Schlitz, Mark D. Sanders, Sam Lorber, Gary Burr, Jennifer Kimball, Thomas Cain, and Dahlia Liamas at the Hillsboro Auditorium on March 9. Poster features woodcuts, including a guitar and music note.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
